prompt: Analyze how {VARIABLE_X2} affects {VARIABLE_Y} considering a linear relationship among the variables. So when you analyze the effect of {VARIABLE_X2} on {VARIABLE_Y}, you should consider analyze the effect of {VARIABLE_X2} on {VARIABLE_Y} in different {VARIABLE_U}. That is, you may want to fit the linear model of {VARIABLE_Y} on {VARIABLE_X2} and {VARIABLE_X1} under different {VARIABLE_U} and interpret the results.
